thread.title: Sasikala jailed for 4 yrs; barred from being Tamil Nadu CM
thread.title_full: Sasikala jailed for 4 yrs; barred from being Tamil Nadu CM

title: Sasikala jailed for 4 yrs; barred from being Tamil Nadu CM
text:
Sasikala jailed for 4 yrs; barred from being Tamil Nadu CM IANS   | Last updated on February 14, 2017 at 09.30 am Share Vote 
(Reuters) This conviction is a major setback for Sasikala, who was aspiring to be Tamil Nadu Chief Minister In a major setback for AIADMK General Secretary Sasikala Natarajan, who is aspiring to be the Tamil Nadu Chief Minister, the Supreme Court on Tuesday restored her conviction in a disproportionate assets case.A Supreme Court division bench set aside a Karnataka High Court order staying Sasikala's conviction by a trial court. Share
